TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit StructureChangedEventArgs extends System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEventArgs

Docs.summary: Contains information about the event that is raised when the UI Automation tree structure has changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType structureChangeType, int32[] runtimeId) cil managed

Docs.param: A single value that specifies the type of change.
The runtime [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element whose structure changed.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the type of change and the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the element whose structure changed.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The values that can be returned in `structureChangeType` depend on the implementation of the UI Automation provider. For example, when items are added to or removed from a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] list box, if the provider is not able to determine the number of items added or removed, it might specify <xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType.ChildrenInvalidated> and not <xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType.ChildAdded> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType.ChildRemoved>.
The following table describes the information in the event received by the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangedEventHandler> for different structure changes.
|`structureChangeType`|Event source|`runtimeId`| |---------------------------|------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType.ChildAdded>|The child that was added.|The child that was added.| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType.ChildRemoved>|The parent of the child that was removed.|The child that was removed.| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType.ChildrenBulkAdded>|The parent of the children that were added.|The parent of the children that were added.| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType.ChildrenBulkRemoved>|The parent of the children that were removed.|The parent of the children that were removed.| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType.ChildrenInvalidated>|The parent of the children that were invalidated.|The parent of the children that were invalidated|
Custom controls might not be able to provide a meaningful value in `runtimeId`. For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.AutomationInteropProvider.RaiseStructureChangedEvent%2A>.
## Examples The following example shows how to construct and raise an event when children are added to, or removed from, a custom list box.
[!code-csharp[FragmentProvider#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FragmentProvider/CSharp/ListFragment.cs#101)] [!code-vb[FragmentProvider#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FragmentProvider/VisualBasic/ListFragment.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32[] GetRuntimeId() cil managed

Docs.summary: Retrieves the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] runtime [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element whose structure changed.
Docs.returns: The runtime [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element whose structure changed.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The return value may be the identifier of the child that was added or removed or, in the case of many children being added, removed, or invalidated, the identifier of the parent. For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>.
Custom controls might not provide a valid runtime identifier.

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating the type of change that occurred in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree structure.
Docs.value: The type of changed that occurred.
